page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Beetley and Gressenhall both have playing fields and village halls. Both village halls are used for many activities such as Ladies Keep Fit, Wedding Receptions, parties and dances.At Gressenhall the hall is used as a social club with a drink licence Gressenhall has a reading room which is by the Parish Council,Girl Guides,Play School,Mother and Toddler group and a Table Tennis club.Beetley and Gressenhall W.I.,Cubs and Brownies meet at Beetley.At Gressenhall there is a Sunday School for younger children and Pathfinders for the older ones.There is a Youth club at Beetley for the 9-18 year olds. Both villages have cricket clubs. Beetley has a football team and Gressenhall a bowls club.
